title: Solar Panel Optimization
description: Craft a prompt to help optimize solar panel placement for a community solar installation. You have access to data on sun angles, weather patterns, and terrain. Objective: Maximize energy production.

parameters.terrain: flat, open field with no shading

title: Wind Turbine Startup
description: Write a zero-shot prompt to guide the setup of a new wind turbine farm. Consider wind speed, direction, and proximity to the grid. Objective: Ensure optimal placement and startup efficiency.
